entry.title: Week in Ethereum News March 9, 2024
entry.summary: Eth News and Links Dencun (Cancun + Deneb) upgrade (meta EIP7569) Pectra (Prague + Electra) upgrade (meta EIP7600) Client Releases Centralization watch: threatening the value of your ETH Layer 1 Inclusion Lists (EIP7547) For Stakers Research Support the Roman Storm & Alex Pertsev legal defense fund The Biden administration is attempting to criminalize open source
